Tags.desc: Both teams always have 5 stars
Tags.name: Unlimited Stars

Tags.desc: Super Duper Jump
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Characters with super jump jump much higher.
Tags.name: Super Duper Jump

Tags.desc: Superstars not unlocked
Tags.name: Disable Superstars

Tags.desc: Star skills forced off
Tags.name: Disable Star Skills

Tags.desc: Turn off stadium hazards
Tags.name: Enable Hazardless

Tags.desc: Fielders will no longer bobble when fielding ground balls
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Fielders will no longer bobble when fielding ground balls
Tags.name: Remove grounder bobbles

Tags.desc: Removes both frames of the slice mechanic
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Slice is when non-line drive star swings when hit on frame 2 (latest possible swing) or frame 10 (earliest possioble swing) result in a hit directly up the middle of the field. This code removes slicing by replacing them with foul balls.
Tags.name: Remove slice

Tags.desc: Both players will use the random teams with random captains
Tags.name: Draft Randoms

Tags.desc: First pick selects 1 character, second pick selects 2. Alternate picks, 2 at a time. Any character can be selected first and second, does not have to be a captain. Captains are chosen at the end of the draft. Bowser must be captain if chosen.
Tags.name: Draft Nolan

Tags.desc: First pick selects 1 character, second pick selects 2. Alternate picks, 2 at a time. Any character can be selected first and second, does not have to be a captain. Captains are chosen at the end of the draft
Tags.name: Draft Snake 1222

Tags.desc: First pick selects 1 character, second pick selects 2. Alternate picks, 1 at a time. Any character can be selected first and second, does not have to be a captain. Captains are chosen at the end of the draft
Tags.name: Draft Snake 1211

Tags.desc: Any draft method can be used
Tags.name: Draft Any

Tags.desc: Flip a coin, winner gets choice Home/Away or 1st/2nd pick. Loser gets choice of remaining, unresolved option
Tags.name: Pick Order Standard Coin Flip

Tags.desc: Enables pitch clock and restricts batter pausing
Tags.name: Enable Game Moderation

Tags.desc: Defaults rules to select game length of 9 innings
Tags.name: Default Nine Innings

Tags.desc: Disables drop spots by default
Tags.name: Default Drop Spots Off

Tags.desc: Fielding player can pause the game twice per inning to make any fielding adjustments. If the pitcher becomes tired, no additional swap is not permitted.
Tags.name: Fielder Swap Limit 2

Tags.desc: Fielding player can pause the game once per inning to make any fielding adjustments. If the pitcher becomes tired, one additional swap is permitted.
Tags.name: Fielder Swap Limit 1 Plus 1

Tags.desc: Fielding player can pause the game once per inning to make any fielding adjustments. If the pitcher becomes tired, no additional swap is permitted.
Tags.name: Fielder Swap Limit 1

Tags.desc: Game must be played on a random stadium
Tags.name: Random Stadium

Tags.desc: Home and away teams are randomly assigned to players
Tags.name: Random Home/Away

Tags.desc: Game length of five innings
Tags.name: Five Innings

Tags.desc: Away team bans stadium, home team then picks stadium from the remaining options
Tags.name: Away Bans Stadium Home Selects

Tags.desc: Controls: Y pitcher, X catcher, R closest to the ball; 15 frame lockout
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Controls: Y pitcher, X catcher, R closest to the ball; 15 frame lockout
Tags.name: Manual Fielder Select 4.1

Tags.desc: Disables the built in manual fielder select code. Can be overriden by a gecko code version of MFS
Tags.name: Disable Manual Fielder Select

Tags.desc: Random Stadium. If Yoshi Park is rolled either user can veto the stadium and a new stadium will be rolled until Yoshi Park is not selected
Tags.name: Random Stadium with option to veto Yoshi Park

Tags.desc: Allows you to draft any character as many times as you want.
Tags.name: Duplicate characters

Tags.desc: Characters have chemistry with themselves and variants
Tags.name: Dup chars and variants have chem

Tags.desc: Reduces the 30 frame lockout period after a hit down to 1 frame. Allows runners to be controlled right away after a hit.
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Reduces the 30 frame lockout period after a hit down to 1 frame. Allows runners to be controlled right away after a hit.
Tags.name: Remove Baserunner Lockout

Tags.desc: Sets Monty Mole's speed to 70
Tags.name: Monty Mole 70 Speed

Tags.desc: Game length of seven innings
Tags.name: Seven Innings

Tags.desc: Users can mutually agree to use a different draft ruleset
Tags.name: Draft: Users' Choice

Tags.desc: Users can mutually agree to use a different number of innings
Tags.name: Innings: Users' Choice

Tags.desc: Users can mutually agree to use a different stadium
Tags.name: Stadium: Users' Choice

Tags.desc: Random roll for a stadium. Can opt to re-roll for stadium to avoid back-to-back games at one stadium
Tags.name: Random Stadium with optional re-roll

Tags.desc: Both teams start with 5 stars at the beginning of the game
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Both teams start with 5 stars at the beginning of the game
Tags.name: 5-Star teams

Tags.desc: Star swings always cost 1 star regardless of original cost
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Star swings always cost 1 star regardless of original cost
Tags.name: Star Swing always 1 star

Tags.desc: Drop spot follows the ball shadow rather than the landing spot
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Star swings always cost 1 star regardless of original cost
Tags.name: Drop Spot on Ball Shadow (Coaks spot)

Tags.desc: Adjusts Bowser's lefty contact to make it mirror his smaller righty contact
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Adjusts Bowser's lefty contact to make it mirror his smaller righty contact
Tags.name: 'Fixed' Bowser Contact (Lefty->Righty)

Tags.desc: Pitcher never gets tired regardless of runs given up or star pitches thrown
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Pitcher never gets tired regardless of runs given up or star pitches thrown. Sets all stamina values to 10
Tags.name: Pitcher never gets tired

Tags.desc:
Patch Notes:
Mario & Luigi: Have stars on charge hit stats
Yoshi: Can now wall jump
Birdo: Remembered her schnoz is a literal cannon (Laser)
Wario: Moved muscle from his dumpy to his arm (Laser) & learned to push his hit
Waluigi: Has gone back to his LDSS roots
Bowser Jr.: Learned how to slide in the field (Sliding Catch) & how to pull balls (but not chicks)
Toadette: Has toad arm and slap hit (plus mid traj)
Toadsworth: Turning back the clock (Toad arm and speed)
Dixie: Learned LDSS from Green Para
King Boo: Inspired by winning the fan vote on the back of all the Boos, gains Boomer power & learned high traj
Piantas: Combined to get Blob speed, PM power, & learned sliding catch from Nokis
Nokis: Combined to get Blue Noki speed, Green contact multiplier, and learned Wall Jump from the Mario Bros.
Bros: Combined to become the ultimate Giga Chad Bro, all have high, pull, curve traj, Fire Power, Boomer/Hammer speed, Boomer slap stats, & learned laser from Bowser
Tags.name: Balance Patch: THE Stars Off All-Star Game 2

Tags.desc: Peach Garden Banned
Tags.name: Peach Garden Banned

Tags.desc: Allows you to draft any character as many times as you want
Tags.gecko_code_desc: Temporary Gecko Code implementation for dupe chars
Tags.name: Duplicate Characters Gecko Code

Tags.desc: Star swings are randomized.
Tags.name: Random Star Swings
